===Glyph origin===
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|氏|t1=(bowing figure)|一|ls=p}} – as with 氏, but a line underneath: a bowing figure standing on the ground.

===Han character===
{{Han char|rn=83|rad=氏|as=01|sn=5|four=72740|canj=HPM,HVPI|ids=⿱氏丶, ⿱氏一}}

====Usage notes====
As a component of complex characters, may have sense of “down, low” from the bowing, stooping figure, as in [[低]] and [[底]]; compare more abstract [[下]].
